Desc.entry: A strategic planning group for the Shire Brook Valley. Stakeholders include Sheffield Homes Environment and Regulatory Service, Sheffield City Council Planning & Development and Parks & Countryside, South Yorkshire Police and local conservation and heritage groups.

DisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400

ContactName.entry: Ted Talbot/Chris Smith, Trees and Woodlands
